White Papers

All OCR R cuneiform pre-processing python stylometry

Advantages and Disadvantages of Stylometric Analysis for Cuneiform Texts

Avital Romach, Shai Gordin April 16, 2023 cuneiform, stylometry, python doi

An opinion piece on what insights can be gained from stylometric analysis into texts written using the cuneiform writing system, and what insights cannot be gained.

Challenges in OCR for Cuneiform Texts

Shai Gordin, Avital Romach April 16, 2023 cuneiform, OCR doi

An overview of the current challenges in cuneiform OCR

Contact us

For any questions about OpenDANES, or to join the DANES discord channel or mailing list, send us an email at the Digital Pasts Lab (digpasts@gmail.com)

OpenDANES is a platform for tutorials and white papers about using computational methodologies for ancient Near Eastern studies
